Text: Not something you wanted to find - an old SLDF bioweapon or the like. Try not to get infected.
Lucky you, there's ${Number} crates here. Unlucky you! A pirate group got there an hour before you.
A larger and more heavily armed group arrived right after you find 1d6 crates. Fight to keep them!
Rival prospector arrived just before you and found ${Number} crate.
Someone else cleaned it out years ago.
A false trail, a wild goose chase and a waste of time.
You found ${Number} crate and no one is around to contest your possession of it.
You find ${Number} crates worth of goods, but someone is accusing you of war crimes in the area.
The Helm Find or something like it. Use some other CYOA or use your imagination.
